rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
At the beginning of your end step, return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it.
notes:
Savior of All

Flying, vigilance
Other creatures you control have protection from your opponents. (They can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything your opponents control.)
